Settings.Name: OrchestratorQueueName
Settings.Description: Orchestrator Queue Name. Be sure to match this name with the one from the server.

Settings.Name: OrchestratorTenantName
Settings.Description: This will be used in the Orchestrator HTTP request in DirectReporter. Standard tenant is Default.

Settings.Name: OrchestratorFolderName
Settings.Description: Used in the Orchestrator HTTP requests to work with queues in right folder. If left empty: 'Default' assigned to Cloud Orch, Current job folder assigned to On Prem Orch

Settings.Name: ProcessName
Settings.Description: This name will be mentioned in the report

Settings.Name: DispatcherProcessName
Settings.Description: The name of the dispatcher which belongs to this performer. This will be used to generate the report.

Settings.Name: ConsecutiveProcessName
Settings.Description: The name of the orchestrator process to run when this complete process would be finished. Global argument is set to False by default. (Note: The robot role needs the permissions to Create Jobs, View Environments and View Processes).

Settings.Name: NumberOfRobots
Settings.Description: The number of robots the the consecutive process is to run on

Settings.Name: MaxInitRetryNumber
Settings.Description: Number of times the Init State (InitAllApplications) can be retried in case of an exception.

Settings.Name: MaxNumberOfTransactions
Settings.Description: [MAKE ASSET] Number of transactions that will be processed in a single run.

Settings.Name: ProcessesToKill
Settings.Description: [MAKE ASSET] Process names of processes to kill in the KillAllApplications WF seperated by commas (i.e. 'chrome,iexplorer')

Settings.Name: ExScreenshotsFolderPath
Settings.Description: [MAKE ASSET] Where to save exceptions screenshots - can be a full or a relative path.

Settings.Name: ScreenshotForBRE
Settings.Description: Boolean to determine the creation of a screenshot in case of a BRE.

Settings.Name: InputDataFilePath
Settings.Description: File path of the input data Excel file

Settings.Name: InputDataSheetName
Settings.Description: Sheet name of the input data Excel file

Settings.Name: GetDefaultInputData
Settings.Description: Boolean to determine of we should read the default inputdata from the GetInputData state.

Settings.Name: ReportTemplateLocation
Settings.Description: This document will be copied and renamed, then filled with results

Settings.Name: ReportStorageLocation
Settings.Description: [MAKE ASSET] Location where the output Excel will be stored

Settings.Name: ReportName
Settings.Description: Will be appended with date and time (yyyyMMdd_HHmm.xlsx)

Settings.Name: ReportBody
Settings.Description: Path to the reporter mail body

Settings.Name: ReportSubject
Settings.Description: Change to NL if necessary. Will appear in the subject-line of the direct reporter

Settings.Name: ReportSenderName
Settings.Description: Will appear as the sender name and in mail signature

Settings.Name: ReportReceiver
Settings.Description: [MAKE ASSET] Separate emailaddresses with semicolon in Orchestrator

Settings.Name: ReportSender
Settings.Description: [MAKE ASSET] You may add static values on the Settings tab for all these assets

Settings.Name: ReportLanguage
Settings.Description: Select the language of the reporter mail

Settings.Name: ReporterIncludeDispatcher
Settings.Description: Boolean to determine if the Dispatcher should be included in the reporter mails

ReporterMail.Name: RP_Opening
ReporterMail.NL: Hierbij ontvangt u uw automatisch gegenereerde verslag van het proces: #processName Mocht u een onverwachte uitkomst hebben opgemerkt, neem dan contact op met uw RPA team.
ReporterMail.ENG: Hereby you receive your automatically generated report from the #processName process. In case you detect any unexpected outcomes, please contact your RPA team.

ReporterMail.Name: RP_QueueItems
ReporterMail.NL: Dit verslag bevat #numItems uitgevoerde queue items welke toegevoegd zijn aan de queue:'#queueName' tussen #from en #to
ReporterMail.ENG: The report contains #numItems processed queue items which have been added to the queue '#queueName' between #from and #to

ReporterMail.Name: RP_Attachment
ReporterMail.NL: In de bijlage vindt u het Excel verslag voor de items en de exceptie screenshots, mochten die er zijn.
ReporterMail.ENG: In the attachments you will find the Excel report for the processed items and the exception screenshots when applicable.

ReporterMail.Name: RP_NoData
ReporterMail.NL: Er zijn geen items gevonden in de queue '#queueName' tussen #from en #to.
ReporterMail.ENG: There were no items found in the queue '#queueName' between #from and #to.

ReporterMail.Name: RP_Faulted
ReporterMail.NL: Het performer proces is gefaald en kon niet op de juiste manier worden uitgevoerd. Neem alstublieft contact op met uw RPA team en stuur het volgende bericht en de mogelijke exception screenshot van de bijlage van deze email.
ReporterMail.ENG: The performer process faulted and could not execute properly. Please contact your RPA team and include the following message and potential exception screenshot from the attachments of this email.

ReporterMail.Name: RP_GeneratedBy
ReporterMail.NL: Deze email is gegenereerd door een Software Robot
ReporterMail.ENG: This email is originating from a Software Robot

ReporterMail.Name: RP_DispatcherStatusNoInfo
ReporterMail.NL: Kon geen informatie ophaleven van de laatste job
ReporterMail.ENG: Could not retrieve information about the last job

ReporterMail.Name: RP_DispatcherStatusFaulted
ReporterMail.NL: Gefaald. Relevante items zijn mogelijk niet toegevoegd aan de queue.
ReporterMail.ENG: Faulted. Relevant items might not have been added to the queue.
